Ingredients: Potatoes, Tomatoes, Onions, Capsicum, Butter, Pav Bhaji Masala
Instructions: Boil and mash vegetables. Saute onions and tomatoes, add spices, mix mashed vegetables, and serve with buttered pav.

Ingredients: Rice, Urad Dal, Potato, Onion, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves
Instructions: Prepare dosa batter. Make potato filling. Cook dosa, add filling, fold, and serve.

Ingredients: Chickpeas, Onion, Tomato, Ginger, Garlic, Spices, Maida
Instructions: Cook chole with spices. Knead dough and fry bhature. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Rajma (Kidney Beans), Onion, Tomato, Spices, Rice
Instructions: Soak and boil rajma. Cook with masala base of onion, tomato. Serve with steamed rice.

Ingredients: Spinach, Paneer, Onion, Tomato, Garlic, Spices
Instructions: Blanch spinach, blend to puree. Cook with spices, add paneer cubes, and simmer.

Ingredients: Wheat Flour, Potato, Onion, Coriander, Spices, Ghee
Instructions: Make dough and prepare potato filling. Roll, stuff, cook on tawa with ghee.

Ingredients: Rice, Urad Dal, Vegetables, Tamarind, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves
Instructions: Ferment idli batter. Steam idlis. Cook sambhar with tamarind and vegetables. Serve hot.

Ingredients: Potatoes, Gram Flour, Garlic, Green Chili, Pav, Chutneys
Instructions: Make spiced potato filling. Dip in gram flour batter and deep fry. Serve in pav with chutneys.

Ingredients: Flattened Rice, Onion, Potato, Mustard Seeds, Curry Leaves, Lemon
Instructions: Rinse poha, saut√© with mustard seeds, onion, and boiled potato. Add lemon and serve.
